description: The points are shared by Grimsby and Chesterfield as they play out a 1-1 draw at Blundell Park.
title: Grimsby Town 1-1 Chesterfield
maintext:
Grimsby Town have lost just one of their last six home Football League games against Chesterfield (W3 D2), scoring exactly four goals in two of those matches.
After winning the reverse fixture 2-1 against Grimsby Town in September, Chesterfield will be looking to complete a first EFL double over the Mariners since the 2008-09 season.
Grimsby have lost each of their last two league games, and will be looking to avoid losing three in succession for the first time since October 2023 (4).
Chesterfield have lost each of their last three league games, and will be looking to avoid four defeats in succession for the first time in the EFL since April 2018.
